description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Sell logistics services including Air freight/ Sea Freight/ Express, Customs clearance and other relevant services...
              
              •	Build and maintain good relationship with shipping lines, master consolidators in order for pricing activities.
              
              •	Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve personal sales targets
              
              •	Develop and maintain relationships with new and existing customers
              
              •	Study, Search, Update of market intelligence, quotations, presentations, concepts, etc... to look for business opportunities
              
              •	Promoting sales of total logistics services
              
              •	Regular meeting customers to understand business requirements and address those needs by all means
              
              •	Conduct sales planning and follow up in line with company sales targets, objectives and strategies
              
              •	Safeguard company’s margin by increasing shipped volume
              
              •	Explore new business within current customers or related parties
              
              •	Strictly follow company guidelines and policies
              
              •	Other tasks as assigned
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Education: Bachelor or Associate Degree
              
              •	Experience in forwarding business
              
              •	Prefer having 2-3 years experiences in the same position
              
              •	A basic working Knowledge of freight & local operations
              
              •	Good soft skills: communication, negotiation, problem solving
              
              •	Sense of responsibility, team work ,motivated and ambitious
              
              •	Willing to learn and develop within the company structure
              
              •	Qualified references from within the industry which will be verified.
              

              Benefit:
              
              •	Working time: From Monday – Saturday morning.
              
              •	Social & Health Insurance according to current law.
              
              •	Annual leave: 12 days.
              
              •	Yearly healthy checking, Yearly company trip, Staff uniforms
              

              Working place : Da Nang office
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
